newsitem.title: CANADA: Imperial Oil lowers posted oil prices.
newsitem.headline: Imperial Oil lowers posted oil prices.

text.p: Imperial Oil Ltd said it lowered the price it would pay for some grades of crude oil by C$9.00/cubic metre or C$1.43/barrel, effective immediately.
The new prices were listed as follows:

Edmonton light sweet C$207.00/cubic metre, or C$32.91/barrel Cromer light sour C$201.00/cubic metre, or C$31.96/barrel Bow River at Hardisty C$174.00/cubic metre, or C$27.66/barrel Midale at Cromer C$183.00/cubic metre, or C$29.09/barrel -- Reuters Calgary Bureau 403 531-1624
